Description

Button for adding a chart to a ChartGrid.

Data extractor class to fetch Air Quality data.

A class for handling air quality parameters.

Enum for different error codes
ChartGrid
 
ChartViewerElement
Chart viewer element, a cell to be added to ChartGrid.

A class for representing coordinates on Earth.

A class for the current data pane.

A static class for the data item used in color table.

A class for picking a custom date range.
DataExtractor
An interface for extracting location-dependent temporal data from APIs.
DataSplitter
Class for splitting data into clusters.
EnvironmentalDataLogger
Application to showcase graphical representations of weather and air quality data.
GeocodingService
The GeocodingService class provides geocoding services by interacting with the JOpenCage Geocoding API.
GridElement
An interface for elements in a ChartGrid.
InfoDialog
Class for presenting relevant information about the application.
Loadable
An interface for classes that can be loaded from a JSON save file.
LocalDateTimeAdapter
A class for serializing and deserializing LocalDateTime objects with Gson.
Location
A class for representing a location on Earth.
LocationDialog
Dialog for inputting location.
MainView
View component of the application's MPV structure.
NotificationBar
A simple notification bar class for nicer user experience.
Presenter
A class that acts as a mediator between the view and the model (APIs).
RemoveChartButton
Button for removing a chart from a ChartGrid.
Saveable
An interface for classes that can be saved to a JSON save file.
SaveLoad
A class for saving and loading objects to/from JSON files.
Settings
A thread-safe class for storing settings.
SettingsDialog
Dialog for changing settings.
TemporalLineChart
A class for a temporal line chart.
TemporalLineChartBuilder
Builder for a line chart with a time based x-axis.
TimeUtils
A class containing methods for various operations regarding time used throughout the application.

Utils class for view related functions
WeatherDataExtractor
WeatherDataExtractor class implements DataExtractor interface to fetch weather data from an API.
